ComicInfo.Title: Jailbreak
ComicInfo.Summary:
The strange, jarring conclusion of “Jailbreak.” Space-POW Lee has a bold plan to outwit the giant, unseen alien captors holding him in an ersatz town: embrace them!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A/Reg | Regular Cover | Guiu Vilanova (a) & Vinicius Andrade (c) | 1 | B/Var | Variant Cover | Francesco Francavilla | 2 | C/Sub | Subscription Cover | Jonathan Ang Lau (a) & Ivan Nunes (c) | 3 | D/RI | 1:15 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Variant Cover | Guiu Vilanova | 4 | E/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Variant Cover | Jonathan Ang Lau | 5 | F/RI | 1:25 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Variant Cover | Francesco Francavilla | 6 |
